sentences.en: Although officially a dependent territory the island is effectively autonomous.
sentences.cn: 虽然正式说来这个岛是附属领土,但实际上是自治的.

sentences.en: Although the two countries were officially at peace, fighting continued.
sentences.cn: 尽管两国公开表示和平共处, 但战斗还在继续.

sentences.en: During the Soviet era and its immediate aftermath, the region was officially known as "Middle Asia and Kazakhstan".
sentences.cn: 在苏联时代和紧随其后的一段时期，该地区的官方名称为“中亚和哈萨克斯坦”。

sentences.en: England shifted officially from a Catholic to a Protestant faith in the 16th century.
sentences.cn: 英格兰于16世纪正式由天主教改信新教。

sentences.en: Examination papers will be handed back after the marks have been officially recorded.
sentences.cn: 成绩正式登记在册之后将把考卷发还.

sentences.en: Figures to be officially released this week reveal that long - term unemployment is still rising.
sentences.cn: 本周要发布的官方数字表明, 长期 失业的人数还在增加.

sentences.en: Has the company officially confirmed the appointment?
sentences.cn: 公司正式证实这项任命了吗？

sentences.en: He officially announced his retirement from first-class cricket yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他昨天正式宣布退出甲级板球赛。

sentences.en: How many members have officially registered in the club?
sentences.cn: 该俱乐部正式登记的会员有多少?

sentences.en: Nothing has yet been officially announced.
sentences.cn: 一切都还没有正式宣布。

sentences.en: Officially, the guard was to protect us. In fact, they were there to report on our movements.
sentences.cn: 这些警卫表面上是为了保护我们。实际上，他们在那里是为了随时报告我们的行踪。

sentences.en: The boat - race has been officially fixed for Thursday, April 2.
sentences.cn: 划船比赛已正式定于4月2日星期四举行.

sentences.en: The library will be officially opened by the local MP.
sentences.cn: 图书馆将由当地下院议员正式揭幕。

sentences.en: The new church was officially opened on July 5th.
sentences.cn: 新教堂于7月5日正式启用。

sentences.en: The nine-year civil war is officially over.
sentences.cn: 长达9年的内战正式宣告结束。

sentences.en: the number of officially recognized political parties
sentences.cn: 官方认可的政党数量

sentences.en: The police say his death was an accident, officially at least.
sentences.cn: 警方说他的死是个意外，起码官方消息如此。

sentences.en: The scheme was officially launched in May.
sentences.cn: 该计划是在5月份正式实施的。

sentences.en: They officially announced the news to the reporters.
sentences.cn: 他们正式向记者发布了这条新闻.

sentences.en: This child is nobody's child until someone makes her theirs officially.
sentences.cn: 在有人办理正式手续认领以前，这个孩子不属于任何人。

words.tran_cn: 军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长
官场；官员（总称）；官僚作风
使官方化；使成为正式；置在政府机关管辖下
正式地；官方地；作为公务员

trans.tran_cn: 正式地，官方地，据传，据公布
